item.description: Free Walking Tour at Center Springs Park. Come for a walk on the loop trail and explore this 55-acre urban park with its hills and gorges right in the center of Manchester. The one-and-a-quarter-hour tour starts at the parking lot at 39 Lodge Drive, Manchester. Children and their parents are especially welcome. Susan Barlow (860-643-9776) of the Manchester Historical Society and Bob Samuelson, long-time neighbor of the park, will lead this approximately one-mile hike, and comment on the history of the park. The terrain is uneven and wet in spots, and participants should wear sturdy shoes. Reservations are not necessary. Adults without children are also welcome. This walk is part of the CT Forest and Park Association’s Trails Day program. For other Trails Day walks and hikes, visit the web site of the CT Forest and Park Association: www.ctwoodlands.org

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Trails Day walk at Center Springs Park, Manchester
